entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 70 percent chance of light snow early this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
